file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: OpenAPI Ref Example
paths:
  /a:
    $ref: './a.yaml'

  /b:
    post:
      summary: b
      parameters:
        - $ref: './parameters.yaml#/foo'
      responses:
        '405':
          description: Invalid input

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /b: post: parameters: parse parameter "": resolve "./parameters.yaml#/foo" reference: invalid parameter reference
